title: Supply shift in the loanable funds market

content.prompt: Which of the following changes in the loanable funds market will decrease the equilibrium real interest rate?

choices.label: A decrease in the expected inflation rate
An increase in government spending on highways financed by borrowing
An increase in foreign financial capital inflows
An investment tax credit for plant and equipment

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
